courses.entryRequirements: Bachelor degree (or equivalent) + specific admission criteria; English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent
courses.fees: Indicative international fee — sekitar AUD 31,336 per year (indikatif; total course fees dilaporkan juga sebagai ~AUD 65k untuk seluruh program tergantung unit).

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat ATAR breakdown pada halaman) — Guaranteed ATAR example 90 (lihat rincian per intake); English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent.
courses.fees: Indicative international fee — sekitar AUD 41,104 per year (indikatif; per sumber kursus/portal pendidikan).

courses.entryRequirements: Completed Bachelor degree (or equivalent) with relevant discipline study (minimum equivalent of 0.75 EFTSL in cognate study); English per Curtin requirements (IELTS 6.5 overall / see Curtin English requirements).
courses.duration: 1 year full-time (program Graduate Diploma of Education — major ini bagian dari degree 1 tahun)
courses.fees: Please see the Graduate Diploma in Education degree page for indicative fees (Curtin menautkan fee indikatif di halaman degree).
courses.courseDetail: View course structure via Course outline (handbook.curtin.edu.au) linked on the offering page

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat ATAR breakdown pada halaman kursus) dan English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent.
courses.fees: Indicative international fee: lihat halaman kursus/degree untuk nilai tahun pertama (biaya indikatif dihitung per credit points).

courses.entryRequirements: Bachelor degree or relevant qualification (lihat halaman program); English: sesuai Curtin English requirements (mis. IELTS 6.5 / band minima tergantung kasus).
courses.duration: Typically 6 months (formal offering page shows durasi program Graduate Certificate)
courses.fees: Indicative international fee: lihat halaman program (Graduate Certificate fees tercantum/indikatif di halaman kursus atau daftar fees Curtin).

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat halaman untuk rincian ATAR) dan English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent.
courses.fees: Indicative international fee — sekitar AUD 43,000–44,000 per year (indikatif; sumber portofolio fee kampus internasional/IDP).

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat halaman kursus) dan English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent.
courses.fees: Indicative international fee: lihat halaman course/degree untuk nilai tahun pertama (biaya dihitung per credit points; cek halaman kurus untuk angka terbaru).

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat halaman) and English: IELTS 6.5 (≥6.0 per band) or equivalent.
courses.duration: Typically part of BCom — standard BCom duration 3 years full-time
courses.fees: Indicative international fee: lihat halaman degree/course untuk angka terbaru (biaya dihitung per credit points).

courses.entryRequirements: Relevant academic entry (nursing prereqs where applicable) and English proficiency per Curtin (IELTS 6.5 overall with band minima; per course rules).
courses.duration: 3 years full-time (program nursing/advanced nursing — per halaman course)
courses.fees: Indicative international fee — sekitar AUD 37,000–45,000 per year (varian antar sumber; cek halaman resmi untuk angka 1st-year indikator).

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR (lihat halaman untuk breakdown); English: IELTS 6.5 (Writing 6, Speaking 6, Reading 6, Listening 6; overall 6.5) per course page.
courses.fees: Indicative international fee: lihat halaman degree/course untuk angka tahun pertama (biaya dihitung per credit points).

courses.entryRequirements: Bachelor degree (or equivalent) + English: IELTS Academic 7.5 overall (min Writing 7, Reading 7, Speaking 8, Listening 8) — higher English criteria applies.
courses.fees: Indicative fees depend on status — page lists Australian & NZ indicative fee A$4,600 (2025) for domestic; international fee: check Curtin fee calculator / offer letter (course-based pricing).

courses.course: Tourism and Hospitality (major within Bachelor of Commerce)
courses.entryRequirements: Standard Curtin undergraduate entry — English typically IELTS 6.5 overall with no band <6.0 (check specific BCom stream page for exact bands).
courses.fees: Please view the Bachelor of Commerce degree page / Curtin fee calculator for indicative international tuition (fees are shown on the Bachelor of Commerce page; course pages point to degree-level fees).

courses.course: Science (Psychology) / Commerce (Human Resource Management & Industrial Relations) — double degree
courses.entryRequirements: Undergraduate entry (selection rank/ATAR) + English: commonly IELTS 6.5 overall (no band <6.0) for business/psychology streams — confirm on course page.
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition reported ~AUD $35,400–35,445 per year (see Curtin / aggregated listings for current year; use Curtin fee calculator for exact).

courses.entryRequirements: Bachelor degree (relevant prior study for primary/secondary) + English: IELTS Academic 7.5 overall (min Writing 7, Reading 7, Speaking 8, Listening 8) for this GradDip (higher English criteria).
courses.fees: Page lists Australian & NZ indicative fee (A$4,600 for 2025) for domestic — international fee not listed on that section; check Curtin fee calculator / course offer for international fees.

courses.entryRequirements: Undergraduate entry (ATAR / selection rank) + English: commonly IELTS 6.5 overall with no band <6.0 (confirm on the course page).
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition reported around AUD $35,400 per year in aggregated listings — confirm with Curtin fee calculator for exact 1st-year amount.

courses.course: Property Development and Valuation (Extension major) — BCom
courses.entryRequirements: Undergraduate entry / selection rank + English: typically IELTS 6.5 overall (no band <6.0) — check the BCom/major page for exact band requirements.
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition: see Bachelor of Commerce degree page / Curtin fee calculator for exact international fee per year.

courses.entryRequirements: Bachelor degree (with relevant background) + English: typical postgraduate English requirement IELTS 6.5 overall (confirm on course page).
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition reported ~AUD $33,000–38,000 per year in aggregated program listings — confirm with Curtin fee calculator for exact 1st-year amount.

courses.entryRequirements: Research entry requirements (undergraduate degree with honours or equivalent) + English: typically IELTS 6.5 (confirm specific research-entry English band on page).
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition reported ~AUD $36,400 per year (program listings) — confirm with Curtin fee pages for exact current fee.

courses.entryRequirements: ATAR / selection rank (competitive) + English: higher English requirement — IELTS Academic overall 7.0 with 7.0 in each band (this course listed under higher English criteria).
courses.fees: Indicative international tuition: check Curtin fee calculator; program listings often quote higher-health-program fees (use official fee calculator for exact).

courses.entryRequirements: High-achieving applicants (eg guaranteed ATAR listed ~85) + English: typically IELTS 6.0 overall (bands 6) for commerce streams — check page for exact bands/ATAR.
courses.fees: Indicative total course fees reported in aggregated listings (e.g. total ~AUD $123,912 across course in one listing) — use Curtin fee calculator / course page for exact per-year international tuition.
